name: Botrush
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

WASD / ARROW KEYS to move

Left Mouse CLICK to pick up the DOCTOR

When the Doctor is being carried:

Left Mouse CLICK to charge the launch, HOLD to throw farther and RELEASE to throw

The DOCTOR fires when carried, but has to go down in order to collect scrap

The DOCTOR repairs the ROBOT using scrap when picked up

The ROBOT is much sturdier than the DOCTOR and can be healed

The DOCTOR cannot be healed through any means
